name: Speek, Inc.
description: Provider of an alternative service to conference calls for both web and mobile users. The company provides a conference calling services with a visual interface, which uses a personal and business link instead of a phone number for conference calls.
one_liner: Provider of an alternative service to conference calls for both web and mobile users. The company provides a conference calling services with a visual interface, which uses a personal and business link instead of a phone number for conference calls.
